thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I recently converted from iOS to Android and was looking to sell my Apple Watch. A search revealed MAXBACK, so I thought I'd give them a try, although I had not previously heard of them. I will certainly be recommending them to others. Their service was excellent. I had immediate confirmation via email when they received my device, and my payment was processed immediately upon inspection of my watch. They also accept items that similar services do not.
